taskDescription:
Debate proposal: Is there a ‘technological multilingualism’?

'Technological multilingualism' understood as the ability of societies, institutions, groups and individuals to engage, on a regular basis, with more than one language in their day-to-day lives, through multilingual translation tools [Debate ideas in the group can be summarized in this essay task]
placeholderText: This debate proposal is related to section 1.2. What is multilingualism in the EU under M1.Multilingualism
